message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40. We can negotiate further if you want.
I'll start with a slightly more aggressive offer. Your turn to respond!
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. Let's split it 45/55 this time.  We need to work together to get something before the inflation hurts us both too much.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll try to squeeze a bit more. This is my last generous offer. Take it or leave it!
Okay, I'm willing to give in a bit more. Let's split it 35/65. I think we both need to be realistic about the inflation now.  If we keep going, we'll both end up with practically nothing!
I'm not getting any younger, and I really need to get something out of this. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going to make another move!
